name: River Frog Hamish
description:
Hamish the frog is a hungry boy and needs some quick grub. Help him eat as many flies as he can in one minute.
Made in 2 days for the Frog Jam.

Controls: Arrow keys and mouse.  (Right click to change quality)

6/25 UPDATE: WASD to move is now optional (which is what I should have done in the first place now that I think about it lol)
